mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SIGN WHERE EMP_ID IN (SELECT EMP_ID FROM EMPLOYEE e WHERE NAME = #{name})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENT (DOC_ID, EMP_ID, DOC_TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, DOC_STATUS, DOC_DATE, FILE_ID, DOC_NUM) VALUES (DOCUMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT EMP_ID FROM EMPLOYEE e WHERE NAME = #{name}), #{doc_type}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'T', NULL, 0, CASE WHEN #{doc_type} = '휴가' THEN 'VACA' WHEN #{doc_type} = '출장' THEN 'TRIP' WHEN #{doc_type} = '보고서' THEN 'REPORT' END || '_' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '_' || DOCUMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DOCUMENT d WHERE DOC_ID IN (SELECT SUBSTR(DOC_NUM,-1) FROM DOCUMENT d WHERE DOC_NUM = #{doc_num}) AND EMP_ID IN (SELECT EMP_ID FROM EMPLOYEE e WHERE NAME = #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT s.EMP_ID , a.APPRV_LEVEL , a.APPRV_STATUS , a.SIGN , s.DOC_TYPE , s.TITLE , s.CONTENT, s.CREATE_DATE , s.DOC_STATUS , s.DOC_NUM FROM (SELECT * FROM DOCUMENT d WHERE EMP_ID IN (SELECT EMP_ID FROM EMPLOYEE e WHERE NAME = #{name}) AND DOC_NUM = #{doc_num}) s LEFT OUTER JOIN APPROVAL a ON s.EMP_ID = a.EMP_ID
